text: Norman "Norm" Howard Bangerter (January 4, 1933 â€“ April 14, 2015) was an American politician. He was the 13th Governor of Utah from 1985 to 1993. He was the first Republican elected to the position since 1965. On April 14 2015, Bangerter suffered a stroke and later died at the age of 82 in Murray, Utah. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American Latter Day Saints Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Governors of Utah Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Norman H. Bangerter
